commands.name: Play Command
commands.description: Play the song you want! Use only the number to select a music! According to the song title!

commands.name: Skip Command
commands.description: This skip command in the current song.

commands.name: Pause Command
commands.description: This command pauses the music being played.

commands.name: Resume Command
commands.description: This command removes the music pause.

commands.name: Stop Command
commands.description: This command ends the discord party by stopping the music.
